The impact of Obamacare on insurance pre: where the majority of Americans get their insurance through their employers.
The limited effect of Obamacare on insur: with only a small increase of around 2 percentage points.
The focus of Obamacare on the individual: which accounts for less than 10 percent of Americans with insurance.
The requirement for everyone to have ins: the prohibition of denying coverage for pre-existing health problems, the establishment of minimum coverage standards, and the provision of subsidies to help with insurance costs.
